consent.text: *{killer} makes passionate love to {victim}, but only after getting consent.*

fursuit.text: *{killer} runs excitedly to the closet and returns with two freshly washed fursuits.*

fuzzy_handcuffs.text: *{killer} eyes {victim} hungrily as they pull out a pair of pink, fuzzy handcuffs.*

leather_whip.text: *{killer} slowly walks toward {victim} wielding a kinky-looking leather whip.*

shh.text: *{killer}, with lust in their eyes, puts a finger to {victim}'s lips.*

toothpaste.text: *{killer} squirts a line of toothpaste on {victim}'s genitals and begins brushing.*

vore.text: *{killer} opens their gaping maw and swallows {victim} whole. {victim} secretly likes it.*

responsible.text: *{killer} makes a move on {victim}, but realizes that {victim} is drunk and leaves them alone.*

massage.text: *{killer} treats {victim} to a sensual back massage.*

disrobe.text: *{killer} takes off their clothes, revealing to {victim} a smaller, more suggestive set of clothes beneath.*

mouthful.text: *{killer} ignores {victim}'s moans and gently pushes another slice of cake into their mouth.*
